bioAsHtml: Functional programming, Software Craftsmanship, Big Data are among my interests. I've contributed to the creation of the BrownBagLunch initiative. I'm currently technical knowledge manager at Ippon Technologies and like to share new ideas by merging old ones.
bio: Functional programming, Software Craftsmanship, Big Data are among my interests. I've contributed to the creation of the [BrownBagLunch](http://www.brownbaglunch.fr/) initiative. I'm currently technical knowledge manager at Ippon Technologies and like to share new ideas by merging old ones.
